    Changes the fixture of the character depending on his movement direction (left/right)

    void swapFixtures​(int dir)

    • charShoot

      public void charShoot​(org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 mouseDir)
      This method calls for shoot method of the Pistol object. This method won't work when the pistol is not picked up or is not initialized.
      Parameters:
      mouseDir - clicked mouse position to send the bullet in right way

    • meleeAttack

      public void meleeAttack()
      This method is an alternative attack to gather ammunition It can be used when the MainCharacter is close to the Enemy or FinalBoss

    • healthCheck

      public void healthCheck()
      This performs the healthCheck If the Health reaches 0 the object is destroyed and a game over song is played

    • swapFixtures

      public void swapFixtures​(int dir)
      This method sets the correct Fixtures to the MainCharacter object depending on the direction it's going.
      Parameters:
      dir - a parameter that indicates the direction the character is going 0 - going to the left (right profile) 1 - goign to the right (left profile)
